name: Dreams of Dali
description: Immerse yourself in the world of the Surrealist master like never before in this encounter, venturing into the towers, peering from them to distant lands and discovering surprises around every corner.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 64 Bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 Bit Processor: Intel i7 processor or equivalent Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 Ti or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1400 MB available space
